long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply right click anywhere in the page, and set your refresh time for that tab.


Works with multiple tabs

Works in the background.

Can click links within, and still refreshes.

Shows selected refresh rate in tab title bar, along with which tabs are refreshing.

Can set up multiple tabs to refresh at different rates, in any combination of foreground/background.


Zero Ads, Zero Tracking, Zero User Data!  

I created this after being tired of ads / extensions not working myself.   Enjoy!
